fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Aquila Favonia, Festering Desire, Prototype Rancour

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Noblesse Oblige <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Elemental Burst DMG +20%.
• Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Instructor <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
• Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: 4pc Instructor is only used for 1-Shot Showcase, and is not recommended for daily-base usage.
